subraces.name: Standard
features: One Skill of choice (Human Versatility)
Increased Carrying Capacity by 25%

subraces.name: High Elf
features: Perception (Keen Senses)
Fey Ancestry (Advantage against being Charmed; Immune to magical Sleeping)
Darkvision
High Elf Cantrip (One Cantrip of choice from the Wizard spell list)

subraces.name: Wood Elf
features: Stealth (Mask of the Wild)
Fleet of Foot (Increases base movement speed by 1.5m / 5ft)

subraces.name: Lolth-Sworn Drow
features: Perception (Keen Senses)
Fey Ancestry (Advantage against being Charmed; Immune to magical Sleeping)
Superior Darkvision (Doubled Darkvision range)
Drow Magic (Dancing Lights, Faerie Fire, and Darkness Spells at levels 1, 3, and 5)

subraces.name: Seldarine Drow
features: Perception (Keen Senses)
Fey Ancestry (Advantage against being Charmed; Immune to magical Sleeping)
Superior Darkvision (Doubled Darkvision range)
Drow Magic (Dancing Lights, Faerie Fire, and Darkness Spells at levels 1, 3, and 5)

subraces.name: High Half-Elf
features: Fey Ancestry (Advantage against being Charmed; Immune to magical Sleeping)
Darkvision
High Elf Cantrip (One Cantrip of choice from the Wizard spell list)

subraces.name: Wood Half-Elf
features: Stealth (Mask of the Wild)
Fleet of Foot (Increases base movement speed by 1.5m / 5ft)

subraces.name: Drow Half-Elf
features: Drow Magic (Dancing Lights, Faerie Fire, and Darkness Spells at levels 1, 3, and 5)

subraces.name: Standard Half-Orc
features: Darkvision
Savage Attacks (Add one additional dice of damage when scoring a critical hit with a melee weapon)
Relentless Endurance (Drop to 1 hit point instead of being downed, once per long rest)

subraces.name: Lightfoot Halfling
features: Halfling Luck (Single reroll on a 1 for an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.)
Brave (Advantage against being Frightened)
Naturally Stealthy (Advantage on Stealth checks)

subraces.name: Strongheart Halfling

fromSubrace: Advantage against being Poisoned and Resistance to Damage Types: Poison damage

features: Strongheart Resilience

subraces.name: Gold Dwarf
features: Dwarven Resilience (Advantage against being Poisoned and Resistance to Damage Types: Poison damage)
Darkvision
Dwarven Toughness (Maximum Hit Point increased by 1 per level)

subraces.name: Duergar

fromSubrace: Advantage on Saving throws against Illusions and against being Charmed or Paralysed

features: Superior Darkvision (Doubled Darkvision range)
Duergar Resilience
Duergar Magic (Enlarge and Invisibility Spells at levels 3 and 5)

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
features: Gnome Cunning (Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving throws)
Darkvision

subraces.name: Asmodeus Tiefling
features: Hellish Resistance (Resistance to Damage Types Fire damage)
Darkvision

subraces.name: Githyanki
features: Astral Knowledge (Gain Proficiency in all Skills corresponding to a chosen Ability each Long Rest)
